articles.title: Tiger Woods finds water 3 times, makes 10 on 12th hole at Masters - ESPN India
articles.description: Tiger Woods made his worst score on a hole in his professional career Sunday, taking 10 strokes at the par-3 12th after hitting his ball into Rae's Creek three times during the final round of the Masters.
